Demi mengelakkan daripada menanggung malu, Milah bersetuju dinikahkan dengan Jiman, pengurus syarikat Dato’ Iskandar. Milah dan Jiman terlibat dalam satu kemalangan jalan raya sehingga mengakibatkan Jiman lumpuh dan mengalami kecederaan otak yang serius. Keadaan menjadi semakin teruk apabila Ikhsan memaksa Jiman untuk melepaskan Milah kerana dia ingin memperisterikan Milah.

programme.title: Menanti Hari Esok
programme.desc: Kisah sebuah keluarga yang mengalami kejatuhan moral kerana pegangan agama yang tidak utuh. Talib yang menghidapi barah harus melalui pelbagai konflik sementara menunggu masa untuk pergi. Anaknya, Jalil mula bersikap derhaka manakala anak keduanya, Ayu hamil luar nikah. Perasaan dikhianati dan ingin mengkhianati mula menguasai diri, pengakhirannya membawa kepada satu kematian.

programme.title: Esok Masih Ada
programme.desc: Kematian satu-satunya anak miliknya akibat leukemia mengubah hidup seorang pegawai polis. ASP Zamri kemudiannya bertemu dengan Marina dan menjalinkan hubungan sulit bersamanya. Pelbagai halangan perlu dihadapinya oleh kerana kerjanya sebagai seorang pegawai polis. Akhirnya, Marina dan Zamri pun berkahwin dan dikurniakan anak - namun anak tersebut diserahkan kepada isteri pertama Zamri, Faridah untuk dijaga.

programme.title: Bila Hati Telah Retak
programme.desc: Diceraikan oleh suami kaki perempuan, seorang wanita memulakan kehidupan baru. Bekerja sebagai bidan kerajaan - namun tidak disenangi seorang bidan tradisional. Pelbagai tohmahan dilemparkan kepadanya sebagai cara untuk dia diusir keluar tetapi bapa saudaranya ada memberikan sokongan moral. Setelah satu insiden berlaku di kampung itu, penduduk lain mula menerimanya.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Selepas kematian isteri tercinta, Mahmud, seorang hartawan telah berkahwin dengan Zubaidah, yang merupakan janda anak satu. Mahmud mempunyai seorang anak lelaki bernama Anuar dan anak angkat perempuan bernama Mira. Baharum, anak kepada Zubaidah berkawan baik dengan Mira. Apabila mereka meningkat dewasa, hubungan mereka bertambah erat dan saling mencintai antara satu sama lain. Anuar tidak senang dengan perhubungan itu kerana khuatir harta ayahnya akan jatuh ke tangan mereka berdua.

programme.title: Tiada Esok Bagimu
programme.desc: Ghazlan seorang arkitek yang mempunyai dua orang anak, Amir dan Emi. Akibat satu peristiwa yang menyebabkan kematian Emi, Ghazlan menjadi buta kerana terlalu sedih. Selepas itu Ghazlan bersama isterinya mengambil seorang anak angkat yang dinamakan Emi. Identiti sebenar Emi dirahsiakan sehingga dia dewasa. Satu tragedi berlaku kepada Emi sehingga dia nekad untuk mencari ibu kandungnya.

programme.title: Langit Tidak Selalu Cerah
programme.desc: Huzaimah gilakan kemewahan dan darjat sehingga sanggup meninggalkan suami dan anaknya demi mengejar kesenangan dunia. Dia berjaya menjadi seorang penyanyi namun telah diperdaya oleh Jeff, lelaki yang dianggapnya sebagai kekasih ke kancah pelacuran. Sedar dan ingin memohon maaf ke suami dan anaknya, dia mula mencari mereka. Namun, kemaafan itu tidak tercapai kerana pintu hati yang sudah tertutup. Kemudian, satu insiden telah membuka semula pintu hati mereka untuk memaafkan Huzaimah yang sedang menghidap HIV.

programme.title: Semalam di Malaysia
programme.desc: Victor Abdullah, penyanyi terkenal yang menetap di Malaysia berkenalan dengan Sandra, mahasiswa di Indonesia. Rumimah, pembantu rumah Sandra ternyata bukanlah seperti apa yang disangka Sandra. Rahsia dan kisah silam terungkit kembali apabila suami dan anak lelakinya yang disangka telah meninggal dunia sebenarnya masih hidup. Pertemuan semula mereka telah membongkar segalanya.

programme.title: Pertentangan
programme.desc: Zainab dan Zabidi merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang dikurniakan dua orang anak lelaki. Zainab seorang isteri yang setia dan taat kepada perintah agama, namun suaminya gemar membuat maksiat. Mereka berpisah dan masing-masing mengambil seorang anak. Zabidi berkahwin dengan Farah dan menyerahkan anaknya itu kepada seorang kenalannya. Farah berlaku curang kepada Zabidi. Ketika Farah sedang keluar berfoya-foya di Singapura, Zabidi mengekorinya dan terlibat dalam satu kes pergaduhan sehingga dia dihukum penjara.

programme.title: Ribut Barat
programme.desc: Sepasang suami isteri, Adnan dan Azizah baru pulang ke tanah air selepas berkahwin di England. Azizah sering memandang rendah kepada keluarga suaminya yang berasal dari kampung. Adnan terlalu sayangkan isterinya sehingga sanggup melupakan ibu bapanya untuk menyenangkan hati isteri. Budaya barat yang diamalkan Adnan dan isterinya itu juga telah menyebabkan rumahtangga mereka retak menanti belah.

programme.title: Senja Merah
programme.desc: Selepas kematian isteri tercinta, Mahmud, seorang hartawan telah berkahwin dengan Zubaidah, yang merupakan janda anak satu. programme.title: Hujan Bulan Juni
programme.desc: Pingkan (Velove Vexia), seorang pensyarah muda di Universitas Sastera Jepang Indonesia, berpeluang belajar di Jepun selama dua tahun. Sarwono (Adipati Dolken) sedih mendengar berita bahawa dia akan ditinggalkan oleh Pingkan.

programme.title: Hello Suria
programme.desc: Seri dan Nasir adalah wartawan dan jurugambar yang gigih mencari scoop dalam liputan berita mereka. Selepas membuat scoop sindiket rokok di pulau pinang Nasir pulang ke Kuala Lumpur. Nasir terkejut apabila melihat isterinya sedang berasmara dengan lelaki lain di biliknya.

programme.title: Beauty In A Bottle
programme.desc: Tiga wanita bergelut dengan rasa tidak percaya diri tentang rupa paras serta rupa bentuk badan mereka, mereka terperangkap dalam kegilaan terhadap produk kecantikan.

programme.title: My Illegal Wife
programme.desc: Clarise mahukan suami oleh kerana desakan keluarga. Selepas kemalangan dia terjaga di sebuah pulau dengan Henry, yang mengalami amnesia. Dia mengambil kesempatan daripada situasi itu dan memperkenalkan dirinya sebagai isterinya.

programme.title: Fighting Fish
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki yang juga seorang peninju berhijrah kesebuah negara lain untuk memulakan hidup baru . pada mulanya nasib tidak menyebelahi lelaki tersebut dan hidupnya berubah selepas menemui seorang rakan yang banyak membantu . setelah gagal mencari pekerjaan rakan lelaki itu mencadangkan dia menyertai liga muay thay secara kecil-kecilan .

programme.desc: Suzana berumur 23 tahun, mengikut kawan-kawannya ke Terengganu, untuk menghilangkan rasa sunyi. di terengganu suzana bertemu Hassan, terbitlah rasa cinta. oleh kerana salahfaham berlakulah pertengkaran antara Hassan dan Suzana.

programme.title: Tiada Tajuk

programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Epok
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Epok yang cuba membaiki hubungan tegang antara dia dan bapanya, Pak Din, melalui sukan badminton.

programme.title: Mau Jadi Apa?
programme.desc: Nordin menghantar pembulinya, Roy, ke hospital. Rudy pula ditangkap polis. 6 bulan kemudian, Nordin menjuarai rancangan kuiz yang selalu ditonton oleh banduan-baduan sesama Rudy. Rudy mengecam Nordin dan mula merancang cara melarikan diri dari penjara supaya dapat membalas dendam ke atas Nordin.

programme.title: Kukira Asik Ternyata Mandang Fisik
programme.desc: Tiara merasa ditipu oleh Morgan kerana Morgan menyamar di aplikasi dating menggunakan foto selebriti lain, walaupun sebenarnya Morgan juga tidak kalah tampan.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep159
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: D'Star Ep91
programme.desc: D'Star ialah pertandingan nyanyian berprestij di mana 30 penyanyi bersaing untuk menjadi All-Stars'. Penyanyi ini adalah dari D'Academy, Selebriti D'Academy, Liga Dangdut Indonesia, dan Bintang Pantura. Mereka akan mempersembahkan pelbagai genre muzik dan menunjukkan kemahiran mereka.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep30
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep110
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep149
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Kang Ojek Be Like: Anak Ayah Mah Cantik
programme.desc: Galuh memarahi Siska kerana bersikap sambil lewa, namun siapa sangka pertemuan itu ternyata membuatkan mereka berdua mengeratkan hubungan antara satu sama lain, bukan sahaja dalam babak, malah dalam kehidupan.

programme.title: Suster El Ep32
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.title: Halo Selebriti Ep23
programme.desc: Program infotainment yang menyajikan berita harian tentang selebriti Indonesia.

programme.title: Begitu Syulit Lupakan Abang Cilor
programme.desc: Dinda merasa sangat sukar untuk melupakan Firly kerana dia adalah lelaki pertama yang Dinda temui sebaik ini. Tanpa disedari, hubungan mereka menjadi rapat kerana Dinda sentiasa menemani Firly ketika menjual cilok.

programme.title: Temu Lawak Ep7
programme.desc: Temu Lawak adalah rancangan komedi dengan kumpulan legenda Srimulat yang akan membuat kemunculan semula melalui rancangan ini. Turut dimeriahkan oleh ramai pelawak dan artis undangan. Di Temu Lawak, pelawak bersatu kembali dengan kisah kontemporari yang dibalut dengan komedi gaya Srimulat.

programme.desc: BUSER atau BUru SERgap Investigasi adalah program berita mengenai jenayah yang telah berlaku di Indonesia.

programme.title: Cinta 2 Pilihan Ep149
programme.desc: Fathir dan Sukma merupakan pasangan suami isteri yang hidup bahagia dalam kesederhanaan di Magelang. Mereka mempunyai seorang anak perempuan bernama Zahra. Fathir bekerja sebagai kontraktor, dan Sukma hanya seorang suri rumah. Pada suatu hari, Fathir menerima projek besar. Malangnya, terdapat masalah dengan projek itu. Masalah timbul apabila Zahra disahkan menghidap penyakit kronik. Doktor mencadangkan agar Zahra menjalani rawatan di Jakarta.

programme.title: Kang Ojek Be Like: Anak Ayah Mah Cantik
programme.desc: Galuh memarahi Siska kerana bersikap sambil lewa, namun siapa sangka pertemuan itu ternyata membuatkan mereka berdua mengeratkan hubungan antara satu sama lain, bukan sahaja dalam babak, malah dalam kehidupan.

programme.title: Calon Presiden Ep30
programme.desc: Impian tanpa sokongan orang tersayang adalah kosong. Pasangan suami isteri, Mustakim dan Rohmah sedang mengandung anak pertama. Semasa majlis meraikan anak dalam kandungan mereka, Mustakim dan Rohmah mengumumkan bahawa mereka mahu anak pertama mereka menjadi presiden suatu hari nanti. Kenyataan itu dipenuhi dengan pendapat berbeza; ada yang mengharapkan yang terbaik manakala ada yang berkata ia tidak masuk akal. Kisah ini bakal menggambarkan perjuangan keluarga tukang jahit yang berimpian besar untuk anak dalam kandungan.

programme.title: Buku Harian Seorang Istri Ep110
programme.desc: Nana dipaksa menikahi Dewa oleh ayahnya, Wawan. Kehidupan seharian Nana penuh dengan seksaan tanpa cinta dalam perkahwinan mereka. Sementara itu, Dewa yang mencintai Alya sejak awal, berkeras untuk mengekalkan hubungan mereka walaupun dia kini sudah berkahwin.

programme.title: Suster El Ep32
programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. Hingga suatu hari, Resti bertemu dengan seorang lelaki kaya bernama Verdi dan mereka akhirnya menikah. Nara sangat gembira kerana perkahwinan Resti membawa kehidupan yang lebih baik untuk mereka, tetapi kegembiraan Nara berakhir seketika apabila dia menemui sesuatu yang menggoncangkan dunianya dan mengancam untuk memisahkan keluarganya.

programme.desc: Rumah tangga Aris dan Wulan hancur kerana tindakan Aris sendiri. Secara diam-diam, Aris berkahwin dengan wanita lain dan ini telah berlaku selama enam tahun.

programme.desc: Kisah seorang gadis yatim piatu bernama Elnara yang tinggal bersama kakaknya, Resti. Demi memenuhi impian Nara untuk menjadi jururawat, Resti bekerja keras. programme.title: Panji Petualang 911 Ep9
programme.desc: Tonton program Panji Petualang 911 untuk mempelajari tentang haiwan dan memerhati keunikan alam liar sambil berseronok dalam pengembaraan bersama Panji.

programme.title: Golden Memories Asia Ep44
programme.desc: Golden Memories Asia merupakan acara pencarian bakat untuk menyanyikan lagu-lagu nostalgia atau lagu lama dari tahun 1970-an hingga 2000-an, dihadiri oleh enam negara Asia Tenggara iaitu Brunei Darussalam, Indonesia, Malaysia, Filipina, Singapura, dan Timor Leste. Program ini adalah untuk memupuk kegembiraan dan keseronokan, serta satu bentuk persahabatan antara negara.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: Guimoon: The Lightless Door
programme.desc: As exorcist Do-jin heads over to an abandoned community center with rumors of strange deaths, he met 3 college students there to capture the rumored events and realised they're trapped…

programme.title: How To Steal A Dog
programme.desc: As the family goes bankrupt, Jiso decided to steal dog from wealthy family and return it for the reward money. Will her plan be successful?

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Recalled
programme.desc: Suffering from memory loss after an accident, Soo-jin begins to see eerie visions of murderous events. She grows suspicious of her husband after seeing a vision of him killing their neighbor…

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: "Operation Chromite" tells the true story of a General, who led the attack against the North Koreans in the Battle of Incheon, forcing them to retreat out of Seoul.

programme.title: Take Point
programme.desc: An elite mercenary force get caught on a CIA mission which sparks fear of an impending World War III.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Rough Cut
programme.desc: When a bad-boy movie star hires a real gangster to take on an opposing role to avoid a scandal after beating a fellow actor half to death, he gets more than he bargained for from this replacement.

programme.title: Cassiopeia
programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's after a car accident.

programme.title: Me And Me
programme.desc: When a detective heads to a rural village to investigate the mysterious death of a couple, he finds himself in an inexplicable situation where his life is completely reversed.

programme.title: Baseball Girl
programme.desc: A young girl is graduating from high school and determined to become the first female player to join a professional baseball in Korea.

programme.title: The Dude In Me
programme.desc: After a high school student falls from the roof of a building and lands on a mafia boss, they awake to discover they’ve switched bodies.

programme.title: The Suspect
programme.desc: Betrayed by his country, a North Korean agent escaped to South Korea in vengeance for his family, yet become the suspect of a homicide.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: Set four years after the zombie outbreak, a former soldier and his team return to the zombie-infested wastelands to retrieve a truck of money and try to escape from it alive.

programme.title: Boomerang Family
programme.desc: A peaceful household is disturbed by the return of a woman’s three grown children one after the other.

programme.title: Seven Days
programme.desc: A lawyer with a 100% winning rate was threatened to defend and set a murderer free in 7 days to save her abducted daughter. The race against time begins...

programme.title: The Royal Tailor
programme.desc: A rivalry between two tailors at the Sanguiwon, the department where the attire worn by royalty were made during the Joseon era, plunges the court into scandal and tragedy.

programme.title: Spiritwalker
programme.desc: A man loses memory and wakes up in a new body every 12 hours. In search of his identity, he met a woman who claims to know him.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: Eungyo
programme.desc: Renowned old poet Jeokyo 's relationship with his son-like student Jiwoo starts to crack when a 17-year-old girl Eungyo steps in.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: The Exclusive: Beat The Devil'S Tattoo
programme.desc: When a journalist discovers that his exclusive story on a serial killer was based on false information, he fabricates more lies to cover his mistake.

programme.title: Coffee Mate
programme.desc: A housewife meets a carpenter at a cafe. They become "coffee mates" where they have no other means of contact besides meeting at the cafe. Soon they find themselves developing feeling for each other.

programme.title: Switch
programme.desc: The life of a top star actor was turned upside down when he meets a taxi driver on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: Take Point
programme.desc: An elite mercenary force get caught on a CIA mission which sparks fear of an impending World War III.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: "Operation Chromite" tells the true story of a General, who led the attack against the North Koreans in the Battle of Incheon, forcing them to retreat out of Seoul.

programme.title: Howling
programme.desc: A detective and his rookie partner probe a murder in which the victim appears to have unusual bite marks.

programme.title: Cassiopeia
programme.desc: Soo-Jin is a successful lawyer and loving mother who tries to live a fulfilling life after her divorce, but things start to fall apart when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's after a car accident.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: A Korean Odyssey Ep17
programme.desc: Having made a contract with Seon-mi 25 years ago, Son Oh-gong entitles her to seek help whenever she calls in exchange for letting him free. The two meet again in a fateful encounter.

programme.title: A Korean Odyssey Ep18
programme.desc: Having made a contract with Seon-mi 25 years ago, Son Oh-gong entitles her to seek help whenever she calls in exchange for letting him free. The two meet again in a fateful encounter.

programme.title: Busan Boys: Sydney Bound Ep10
programme.desc: Korea's first working holiday variety show where four Busan boys work, live, and travel in Sydney. While taking short-term jobs, the four will meet the locals and learn about their culture.

programme.title: K-POP GENERATION Ep3
programme.desc: Join the industry’s leading artists as they take us back to the origins of K-POP and walk us through the progression of the industry over the years.

programme.title: Europe Outside Your Tent: Norway Ep9
programme.desc: Yoo Hae-jin, Jin Seon-kyu, Yoon Kyun-sang ,and Park Ji-hwan reunited for a new journey, this time on a Winter camp in Norway, to fulfill their life dream of sighting the Northern Lights.

programme.title: Sixth Sense 3 Ep2
programme.desc: Yoo Jae-suk and his fellow cast members return for the 3rd season! They will visit different places or people, and use their 'sixth sense' to analyze and figure out which one is entirely fabricated.

programme.title: EXchange 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Dating reality show <EXchange> is back with season 2! When the ex-couples reunite and start building relationships with each other, will they get back with their ex or date someone new?

programme.title: Earth Arcade Ep1
programme.desc: Na PD is coming back with a new multiverse action adventure variety! Follow the four female warriors to Thailand who set out to capture the rabbit which has escaped from the moon and landed on earth.

programme.title: Honeymoon Tavern Ep6
programme.desc: Kim Hee-sun, EXO‘s KAI and more celebrity casts run a tavern in Udo Island to serve homemade dish and create unforgettable memories for 3 newlywed couples who got married amid the pandemic.

programme.title: Busan Boys: Sydney Bound Ep10
programme.desc: Korea's first working holiday variety show where four Busan boys work, live, and travel in Sydney. While taking short-term jobs, the four will meet the locals and learn about their culture.

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim Ep14
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes – from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.desc: <Love Catcher in Seoul> is a dating psychological game played by 'love catchers' who participate for searching true love and 'money catchers' who only aim for money.

programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes – from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: Go Go With Mr. Paik Ep3

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep456
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: Young Days No Fears(M) Ep5253
programme.desc: The six girls, as good friends, have gone through their difficulties and crises in relationship, at work, and in their marriage together. Despite many challenges in life, they are not afraid. They have got each other’s back.

programme.title: Battle Tour(M) Ep8
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep849850
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep680
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3381
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep46634664
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: In the Family (T) Ep7172
programme.desc: "Home" as axis X and "love" as axis Y, this piece exquisitely depicts the ups and downs in life of an ordinary family. From touching sibling love, to the struggles and entanglement of parent-child relationship, the show elaborates on the importance of encountering the surroundings with a positive attitude. Through a bowl of beef noodle soup, Hui-wen and Chien-chin teach their four daughters, Spring, Summer, Fall, and Winter, how to behave around others. The heartwarming play is relaxing, fun, humorous, and a tearjerker.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1831
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality (T) Ep954
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Caught in Time
programme.desc: Based on true events, Detective Zhong Cheng leads a task force in pursuit of Eagle, a criminal gang led by Zhang Sun. Highly methodical and disciplined, the gang manages to avoid capture after each heist. A decade later, the need to stop Eagle is more urgent than ever when Zhong Cheng realizes that his time is almost up to solve the case.

programme.title: As Tears Go By
programme.desc: Mobsters Wah and Fly are buddies. Wah loves his cousin, but cannot make their relationship work as he is a mobster. Fly infuriates a mob boss one day and got beaten up badly, implicating Wah too. He then takes up a fatal task to make amends…

programme.title: Once Upon a Time in Hong Kong
programme.desc: This is a story of ICAC investigators fighting against rampant corruption in early 1970s’ Hong Kong. A police sergeant teams up with a triad boss to make billions of dollars in bribes. As a lawyer joins his friend in ICAC to investigate their collusion and fight against corruption, the battle between the righteous and the wicked has just begun.

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: Ng Ka Wai is hoping that he will see his loving mother Mui again one day. Mui has apparently been avoiding her son for over a decade while Wai is suffering from depression and panic disorder. When his lost memory suddenly returns, he recalls what he has done to his mother - an unforgivable sin leading to the 10-year separation.

programme.title: Men Suddenly in Love
programme.desc: Five high-school alumni - councilor Ng Yuk Yan (Eric Tsang), actor Cheung Chau Wan (Jim Chim), gynecologist Fu Mo Sum (Wong Jing), feng shui master Szeto Kei Fung (Chapman To), and dance coach Charlie Lam (Det Dik) - get together to throw a birthday party for their respected teacher Mr. Chu (Richard Ng), who enlightened them about the birds and the bees. Five delectable young models appear at the party, during which the 80-year-old educator gets too excited and unfortunately kicks the bucket - but not before telling his pupils to fulfill his last wish and get a little naughty! The quintet of married men then takes it upon themselves to conquer the babes, all the while trying to evade the watchful eye of their wives (Maggie Cheung Ho Yee, Yeung Sze Man, Monica Chan, Mak Ling Ling, and Jacqueline Chong).

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: One Second
programme.desc: Directed by renowned director Zhang Yimou, the film is set during the Cultural Revolution, where a common man escapes a labour camp to find a newsreel that captures his daughter for one second in a movie. On the way, he encounters an orphan who also seeks the movie reel. Can the man finally pass the reel to a projectionist and screen the movie?

programme.title: Man on the Edge
programme.desc: On the eve of the 1997 handover, violence is rampant with triad forces causing chaos in Hong Kong. The triad gang leader assigns his right-hand man Ah Lok to take charge of the drug trafficking business. However, Ah Lok turns out to be an undercover police officer who unveils a shocking political conspiracy during the investigation.

programme.title: The Fate of Reunion
programme.desc: Thousands of years ago, Green Snake gained enlightenment under the guidance of Dao Qing and gradually falls for him. However, her devotion to Dao Qing caused him to reincarnate and go through the pains of death. Since then, she sets out to search for the many reincarnations of Dao Qing over hundreds of years to help him reverse the situation…

programme.title: Just 1 Day
programme.desc: Mosaic, an urban sketcher, is suffering from ALS and wants to create some fond memories as his condition worsens. When Mosaic reunites with his old classmate Angelfish, whom he has a crush on since primary school, he asks her to fulfill his one last wish by becoming his girlfriend for just one day. Will Angelfish say “yes”?

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Bodies at Rest
programme.desc: When three armed criminals barge into a morgue, a forensic doctor and his student must fight with their lives to stop the criminals from obtaining a bullet from inside a corpse that is a key piece of evidence in a deadly crime.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the “midnight gymnasium” programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kong’s legendary detective?

programme.title: Cold War
programme.desc: A hijacking of a police van occurs when the Police Commissioner is away from Hong Kong. Deputy Commissioner Lee leads a rescue operation code-named Cold War. Fellow Deputy Commissioner Sean moves to take control from Lee as he thinks Lee is emotionally affected by his son being held hostage, but the efforts end up threatening both their reputation.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kong’s ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: PTU
programme.desc: When OCTB (Organized Crime And Triad Bureau) officer, Sergeant Lo Sa, loses his police revolver to four triad young thugs, he seeks help from Sergeant Mike Ho of the PTU (Police Tactical Unit) to find his lost revolver. Ho and his patrolling PTU team has until dawn to recover the gun and clean up the mess.

programme.title: Touch of the Light
programme.desc: A blind but talented pianist Siang encounters an unrecognized but skilful dancer Chieh. Chieh is attracted to the courageous Siang while Siang is fascinated by the adventurous Chieh. Their friendship grows as Siang and Chieh pursue their dreams together. Sandrine Pinna was awarded Best Actress for her role as Chieh in the 2012 Taipei Film Festival.

programme.title: Incredible Monk, Dragon Return, The
programme.desc: Ko Yan Kit is a famous General in Song dynasty. Due to public pressure, Ko dare not confess his feeling for his first love Fung Yee, who is forced to work in a brothel. Feeling helpless, he asks a monk for help. Everything goes smoothly, but when Fung Yee is suddenly killed, the monk must travel to the underworld to save Ko’s first love!

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Horseplay
programme.desc: Ha Mui goes to London to track down an art thief, Nine-Tailed Fox, who is interested in a pottery horse from the Tang Dynasty. Cheung Ho is a cop who chases after Nine-Tailed Fox since he escaped years ago. The trio must work together to gain the pottery, with Nine-Tailed Fox being hunted by his rivals at the same time.

programme.title: Love for Life
programme.desc: Set in a small Chinese village, where an illicit trade in human blood has resulted in the spread of HIV, De Yi and Qin Qin are two fellow AIDS sufferers who unexpectedly fall in love with each other and risk everything to pursue a last chance at happiness...

programme.title: Tears of No Regret
programme.desc: Monkey King is bewitched and harmed by an evil spirit, who is none other than goddess Lucky Star in its previous life, whom Monkey King knows 300 years ago. He decides to travel back in time to find out what happened…

programme.title: A Witness out of the Blue
programme.desc: The police suspects that a jewel thief, found dead in his unit with all stolen goods missing, is killed by his gang leader. They also found the crime to be related to a jewel robbery many months ago, with the robbers involved being killed off one by one. In this complicated case, the police’s only witness is a talking parrot from the crime scene.

programme.title: Somewhere Winter
programme.desc: The film follows the love story of a university student, An Ran and a Taiwanese man, Qi Xiao. They met and fell in love at a concert by Chyi Chin, a Taiwanese singer, in Beijing in 1991. However, courage alone may not be enough for the lovers to stay together, and goodbyes may truly mean the end. Will An Ran and Qi Xiao meet again in 2019?

programme.title: Cold War 2
programme.desc: Sean Lau is now the Police Commissioner after the successful rescue operation Cold War. However, the culprits from the past not only dodged justice but even escalated their actions and kidnapped Lau’s wife. He breaks every protocol to get her back, which puts him under investigation.

programme.title: Diary Of A Lady-Killer
programme.desc: Tycoon Zhou is a playboy who is engaged to be married, but that did not keep him from working his charms on as many ladies as he can. He keeps a diary about his romantic escapades and soon, the women with whom he has been intimate with are being murdered one by one. Zhou becomes the number one suspect by the police but is the killer someone else?

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: Princess Iron Fan
programme.desc: As Monkey (Yueh Hua) and his gang make their way to the West through Fire Mountain, they ran into the evil Princess Iron Fan (Pat Ting Hung), Madam White Bone (Cheng Pei Pei) and her sexy sister (Lily Ho), and have to fight their way through.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Fast Fingers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Uncle Bill returns to make a fortune with his past thieving partners. They continue to prey on the unsuspecting public, but are closely watched by the upright police chief, who happens to be the boyfriend of one of Uncle Bill’s nieces!

programme.title: Lady Of Steel
programme.desc: A young swordswoman Fang Ying Qi sets out to join the Flying Dragon Clan in their defense against the invading Jin forces. Fang also intends to avenge the murder of her parents by bandit leader Han 20 years ago. Han has since taken on a false identity as a member of the Flying Dragon Clan and Fang must rely on her deadly sword skills to stop Han.

programme.title: Pale Passion
programme.desc: Fa is an obsessive man who loves his wife Ah Hsia but is easily jealous and abuses her. When she leaves him one day, Fa hooks up with another woman, Hsing. A deadly triangle develops when Fa runs into Ah Hsia again and decides to win her back…

programme.title: Rape Of The Sword
programme.desc: The film starts out with two students fighting for their deceased master's sword called the "Green Frost Sword". Han kills the other student, takes the sword and offer it to the king. The wife of the other dead student plots to take revenge, going undercover to retrieve the sword at the first opportunity in this tale of revenge and betrayal.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: The Dancing Millionaires is of the most enjoyable musicals to grace the Hong Kong screens, starring husband & wife team Peter Chen Ho and Betty Loh Ti presenting some extraordinary performances.

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Mongolian emperor Kublai Khan is being assassinated while meeting with the Italian explorer Marco Polo. Marco Polo is appointed to lead the troops for the emperor to wipe out the anti-Mongol rebels. Yet, he is touched by these rebels who are resisting the Mongolian invasion of their homeland. Will Marco Polo stay loyal to the emperor?

programme.title: Illicit Desire
programme.desc: This instant cult classic adapts three erotic and mystical tales from the Chinese classical works, with stories spanning across time from the Tang to Ming dynasties. The stories, filled with characters such as emperors, concubines, monks and fortune-tellers, intertwine in a world of adultery, lust and greed, alongside great costumes!

programme.title: Challenge Of The Masters
programme.desc: Young Wong Fei Hung must prove himself worthy to be taught by Master Lu, the same martial arts teacher of his father. Although he is defeated in the competition, Wong Fei Hung’s passion in Kung Fu finally allows him to become Lu’s disciple.

programme.title: The Tea House
programme.desc: Real-life champion martial artist Chen Kuan-Tai plays a powerful role in this memorable saga of action and romance; fighting against gangsters for his true love.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu’s until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: Tales Of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Blood Brothers
programme.desc: The friendship of three sworn brothers, Zhang, Huang and Ma breaks when Ma gives in to corruption and falls for Huang's wife, eventually leading to a bloody ending.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: The Secret Of The Dirk
programme.desc: The inhabitants of the City of Liu are forced to flee when the vicious Black Tigers gang raids their city, but are able to hide all their gold and treasures in a valley. A team of swordswomen led by Liu wants to get their hands on the treasures before the bandits, but both parties will have to contend with the wandering swordsman Chou for them...

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief’s illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father’s death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Proud Youth
programme.desc: Ling Hu Chong, a Huashan clan’s disciple, is assigned to find the successor to the score “The Proud One”. Ling identifies Ying for the score but finds out that she is the daughter of the evil clan’s leader. At the same time, he is unwittingly dragged into an epic power struggle between clans, with complicated allegiances and perplexing moralities.

programme.title: The Last Tempest
programme.desc: This sequel to The Empress Dowager continues the tale of Emperor Guangxu and Empress Dowager Cixi. Despite Guangxu’s enthronement, his ability to rule effectively is overshadowed by the ever-present power of Cixi. When his attempts to reform the Imperial system are thwarted by the Empress Dowager, Guangxu attempts to curb her power.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Love Parade
programme.desc: Fashion designer Shi asks his friend Mui to comment on his new design but is angered by her criticism. When Mui asks him to design a gown for her to attend a gala event, Shi takes revenge by making a clown costume instead. Seeing Mui’s embarrassment, Shi feels guilty and apologizes to her, before they fall in love…

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: Crocodile River
programme.desc: This story has a Romeo and Juliet flavour. Two families who hate each other live across the opposite sides of a river filled with crocodiles and do not bother to have a bridge built. Their respective children meet in university and fall in love, but have to find ways to be together and resolve the hatred between their families.

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu-lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun-yang.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou’s brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Li’s wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Li’s Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mother’s death – a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls’ high school, is stuck with a baby that isn’t his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.desc: Hadi and Fifi are colleagues and deeply attracted to one another. However, both are married. As time passes, the burden of their infidelity creeps up on them. One day, Hadi discovers that his wife is pregnant. Will Hadi end the affair?

programme.title: All For Diego

programme.title: Italian Gigolo
programme.desc: Filippo is the hottest male escort. Incredibly sexy, he makes up in looks for what he lacks in wits. When an accident causes him to undergo plastic surgery, he wakes up to find himself in a new body, with a new face and a new kind of beauty.

programme.title: Kids Run
programme.desc: Andi is a former boxer who now struggles as a day labourer. When he loses his job suddenly, he finds himself threatened with the loss of custody of his beloved three children. An amateur boxing competition with a huge prize money becomes his only hope.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: The Winters
programme.desc: The Winters family undergoes an upheaval when Marie, the daughter, relocates to Berlin. Tanja plans on divorcing Matthias, leaving him with a wounded pride. He fights to save his marriage but fails, until he rediscovers a new perspective in life.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafa’s life.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: Three-Way Junction
programme.desc: A woman visits a man who lives alone in an apartment. Hidden in an illuminated background of romance, marital affairs and complex love, there are many secrets that have only just begun to unravel. From the creators of “Sneha: The Black In Every Pink”.

programme.title: One Floor Below
programme.desc: After being the sole unfortunate witness to a domestic quarrel that ends up in a murder, Patrascu finds himself at odds with two very close neighbours: one is the bizarre murderer. The other is his very own conscience.

programme.title: Catch Of The Day
programme.desc: Alex, a driven young man, is forced to leave Hamburg for his small hometown to care for his sick father. With his finances running dry, he tries in vain to sell the family house and ends up resorting to hilarious measures to enhance its property value.

programme.title: Kill Pinochet

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafa’s life.

programme.title: One Breath
programme.desc: Amidst a mid-life crisis, Marina chances upon free diving and decides to commit herself to this high-risk sport entirely. Each time, submerged with just one breath in the oceanic abyss, she learns to embrace inner peace. Based on a true story.

programme.title: Verdict
programme.desc: Joy, mother of a six-year-old girl, lives in constant fear of her abusive husband, Dante. One day, Joy flees home and seeks help from the police. As time passes, she discovers an equally nightmarish bureaucracy that cruelly denies her justice and reprieve.

programme.title: Her Job

programme.title: One Floor Below

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: Difret
programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Meza’s decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.title: International Falls
programme.desc: Dee is a middle-aged mother of two who is stuck in a Midwest rut. While on vacation, she meets Tim, a washed-up stand-up comedian, and an unlikely bond develops. Together, they find the silver lining in their gloomy lives.

programme.desc: The competition heats up as Brandon and Lori find themselves in an all out bidding war with the tough-talking Taylor brothers. Amidst the chaos, Jesse goes all-in for a locker that could be hiding an expert marksman's rare weapons. And later, Sean unveils a bin whose stench is so rancid it sends the buyers running. But when one of our competitors takes a gamble, the entire group is blown away by the score.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 07
programme.desc: Michael and his fellow employees debate the authenticity of a giant lizard and find a game with a very specific target audience. Then at the diner, he adds some spice to lunch time and gives patrons the chills while demonstrating a new way to cool soup. Finally at the furniture store, Michael shows his coworker that impossible things can happen in the blink of an eye.

programme.title: A Man Apart
programme.desc: Sean Vetter and Demetrius Hicks are a pair of DEA agents who think they've made the bust of a lifetime when they capture 'Memo' Lucero, a multi-millionaire drug lord who controlled most of the narcotics traffic along the border of Mexico and the United States. However, with Lucero behind bars, a new and decidedly more dangerous underworld kingpin rises to take his place, and Diablo, soon proves to be even more dangerous than Lucero when he orders his gunmen to assassinate Vetter. While Vetter escapes unharmed, his wife is killed, and Vetter is thrown deep into despair. Now Vetter is obsessed with bringing Diablo to justice, and he's willing to do anything to bring him down - even if it means teaming up with Lucero.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S2 3
programme.desc: Our buyers go to war to win a locker packed with valuable vintage surf gear. Then, Brandon and Lori get stuck with a busted bin, but when they find a glass case filled with an unidentifiable goo, they're left wondering if this unit smells like moneyor just plain stinks. And later, the day's final auction unleashes a bidding war so medieval, someone will have to be carted away.

programme.desc: In this special crossover event, the Impractical Jokers help Michael stun coffee bar customers - but soon discover the joke is on them! Plus, Michael's woodland creatures display fantastic hidden abilities.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect: Double Takes - Back To Fight Or Flight
programme.desc: Michael reanimates a chameleon fish, reboots lengthy corks, remakes the airport bird man, and more with all-new reactions.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect Special: Critter Countdown
programme.desc: In this special episode, Michael ranks the series' most incredible moments involving animals, counting down to the very best in zoological trickery.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S15 7
programme.desc: The curtain goes up and IQs go down as truTV brings you 20 of the dumbest performers ever to grace the stage. You'll see a Nutella-covered artist, the longest (and worst) death scene in film history, and a Japanese game show you have to see to believe. Reviewing the performances is our celebrity cast, including Danny Bonaduce, Judy Gold, Kevin McCaffrey, and Brendon Walsh.

programme.desc: Europe - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Europe - a crowded continent transformed by man, yet still inhabited by rare animals.

programme.title: Mediterranean with Simon Reeve S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Simon Reeve embarks on the second leg of his four-part journey around the Mediterranean, travelling from Cyprus, across the sea to Lebanon and on to Israel and the Gaza Strip.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep3
programme.desc: Oregon - Ben spends time with Pirate Rob, who lives for half the year with his 18-year-old son Damien in a sandbag house on an island in the middle of an industrial river in Oregon.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Sri Lanka - Robson Green meets some of Sri Lanka's marine life, including sardines, mahseers, black jacks and mangrove jacks.

programme.title: After the Wildfires
programme.desc: After the Wildfires - Examine fire’s pivotal role in shaping Australia’s natural world. Tour the devastation left by 2020’s brutal bush-fire season, learn how climate change fuelled this watershed event, and chart the long-term recovery of the continent’s wildlife.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Laos: the Mountain Wilds - Laos is a country where most of its western is demarcated by the Mekong River. Being one of the most pristine natural landscapes, Laos plays host to a diverse animal kingdom. It’s topography is largely mountainous, and this steep terrain is blanketed by northern Laos’s tropical rain and monsoon forests.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep3
programme.desc: Social - Meet alphas who get by with a little help from their friends. Discover the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins, ponder ant colonies’ unique scents, find out why female geladas always get the last word, and see wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lyca the Painted Wolf - In central Namibia, a pack of painted wolves roams the arid land. Amid threats from lions and drought, a plucky little pup called Lyca has to grow up fast, learn the skills of a hunter, and find her place as member of the pack.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Bahamas Exuma Cays - The Exuma Cays are a remote wonder: hundreds of tiny islands extending south from the Bahamian Capital of Nassau. In the 1950’s, developers dreamed of developing this pristine, and largely unexplored region. But before construction could begin, the Bahamian government supported an expedition to chart the cays. They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas’ first Ocean Park.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloo’s conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: After the Wildfires

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep4
programme.desc: Scrappy - Celebrate small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons. Admire nutrias’ stink bombs; honey badgers’ savage, needle-like choppers; black-tailed gulls’ razor-sharp beaks; and the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Choices - Learn how Ningaloo’s conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Pointy Bits - Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Scroungers/Scavengers - Go scavenging with nature’s cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars’ fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas’ bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Chinga the Lion Cub - In South Africa’s Greater Kruger Park, A little cub called Chiga has been born into family of hunters - the Mala Mala lion pride. Under the guidance of a devoted father, a fierce mother, and a playful sister, Chiga finds her place in the pride.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mob Rules - The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Road to Independence - As the babies grow, new power struggles break out in each troop. Watch as every member, from fierce Queen Crystal to low-ranking Erica, jockeys for position. Meanwhile, the babies start to understand how allies and enemies will shape their future.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Berenty Dynasty - The pressure to find food reaches new heights and throws the reserve into turmoil. Witness fractures emerge within the ranks, dividing the gangs and leading Crystal, the indomitable leader of the Ruins gang, to face a challenge like none before.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 Ep3

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Thailand: Coming of Age - The Mekong continues its journey south marking the Eastern border of heart of South East Asia, Thailand. It is the juncture of many major regions, where temperate north meets tropical South, making it one of the most biodiverse countries in the world.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dying for Rain - South Luangwa National Park is one of Africa’s great wild places. Lying at the southern tip of Africa’s Great Rift Valley, its extraordinary mosaic of habitats supports a rich diversity of life. The fortune of every animal that lives here is inextricably linked to the two vastly different seasons they experience – the wet and the dry.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Secret Life of Snakes - The snakes of Australia are as diverse and striking as the landscape they inhabit; there are more than 300 different species here, some harmless to humans, others deadly. From the death adder which has a strike almost quicker than the human eye, to the scrub python which is equipped to track its prey, snakes know how to survive in this inhospitable land.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep7
programme.desc: Colors & Patterns - Get a front-row seat to nature’s most spectacular fashion show. Admire the luxuriant blond manes of golden snub-nose monkeys, stunning pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet, and the meaningful markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Big Ones - Learn why bigger is definitely better for these alphas. Go ringside for a gorilla wrestling match, stay away from pushy moose antlers, steer clear of long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and marvel at a megashark’s stereo sniffer.

programme.title: New Kids in the Wild 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Usana the Cheetah Cub - Usana, a cheetah cub is born with the odds stacked against her. Few cheetah cubs make it through their first year. Lucky for her, she’s got an amazing mother who will stop at nothing to keep her cubs safe. Usana might just follow in her footsteps.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo 1 Ep2
programme.desc: From Pouch to Foot - Eastern Grey kangaroos are prolific breeders, but bringing up baby is fraught with challenges. Predators, climate extremes, and lively joeys mean kangaroo mothers face a daily struggle to keep their young alive.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Into the Heat - Meet the unlikely collaborators working to ensure mutual survival in the Kalahari Basin. Learn of an elephant clan’s symbiotic link to fruiting anaboom trees, a meerkat’s alliance with a feisty drongo bird, and more flora-and-fauna odd couples.

programme.title: Mysteries of the Mekong 1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Karst Caves - Squeezed between South East Asia’s two most formidable geographical barriers - the Annamite mountains and the Mekong river, lies Khammouane – a rugged karst landscape, honeycombed with countless caves. These caves were formed by water flowing down towards the Mekong.

programme.title: Valley of Flood and Fire 1 Ep3
programme.desc: Dying for Rain - South Luangwa National Park is one of Africa’s great wild places. Lying at the southern tip of Africa’s Great Rift Valley, its extraordinary mosaic of habitats supports a rich diversity of life. programme.title: Reef Wrecks 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Florida Keys Shipwreck Trail - The Florida Keys is the first line of defence for the southern US. With a rich naval history and a coastal lifestyle, it’s easy to believe locals who claim these waters are home to as many as 1000 shipwrecks.

programme.desc: Bahamas Hollywood Wrecks - The Bahamas is known as the “underwater movie capital of the world”. Hollywood has been coming here for decades, making epic movies and TV shows in its crystal clear waters, leaving behind a host of cinematic shipwrecks.

programme.title: Donal's Family Food in Minutes S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Donal shares a series of recipes that have been passed down through his family, including a winter pavlova, kleftico, lemon slices and coq au vin blanc.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Gregg and Chris are in Scotland with a young family relying on takeaways and wasting food. Dad Ajaz wants spicy dishes whereas mum Aliyah prefers milder flavours, but can we get them eating more veg, enjoying the same food and saving money?

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Tammy & Colin's Horsebox - In the Cotswolds, unique spaces expert Simon Parfett and his team meet Tammy and Colin. Wanting to spend more time together as a family and create extra income, they decided to buy a horsebox which they could rent out to festival-goers.

programme.title: Grand Designs: House of the Year S7 Ep4
programme.desc: Materials and Craftsmanship - Kevin and the experts look at a meticulously crafted barn conversion and a timber-framed, timber-clad eco home, before the winner of the RIBA House of the Year 2022 is announced.

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rick Stein's 'journey without maps' takes him through France's eastern border regions of Alsace and Jura home to his favourite French dish, choucroute garni.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep4
programme.desc: The first quarter-final involves an Invention Test using tinned food. Then the contenders cook two courses for restaurant critics Jimi Famurewa, William Sitwell and Tracey Macleod.

programme.title: Eat Well For Less S7 Ep4

programme.title: Rick Stein's Secret France S1 Ep2

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Jon and Michelle's Horse Cart - In the ancient Forest of Dean, expert treehouse-builder Simon Parfett meets Jon and Michelle. Jon runs a forest retreat and has had the idea to turn an old horse cart into unique accommodation for his guests.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Like Mamma Used To Make S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Procida - Gino visits Procida and meets two women who are making a mark on the culinary landscape of a tiny island that has a big reputation when it comes to food.

programme.title: Extraordinary Places to Eat S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Venice - Chef Angela Hartnett takes Fred to Venice to enjoy the simple but stunning food at her favourite restaurant and to experience unforgettable service at Italy's oldest cafe.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep5
programme.desc: Heat three sees four professional chefs challenged to prepare agnolotti with a pea and mint pesto and pan-fried calves liver with walnut beurre noisette.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals S14 Ep6
programme.desc: Heat three continues as the contenders cook their Signature Dishes. The two most impressive chefs will go through to the quarter-final.

programme.title: George Clarke's Old House New Home S8 Ep1
programme.desc: Southwick and Southport - Duncan and Josie attempt to transform their 18th-century barn into a liveable family home. And can Jenny restore a Victorian gothic pile in Southport to its former glory?

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Like Mamma Used To Make S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Procida - Gino visits Procida and meets two women who are making a mark on the culinary landscape of a tiny island that has a big reputation when it comes to food.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's 24 Hrs to Hell and Back S3 Ep7
programme.desc: The Park Restaurant & Bar - Kirin and Angelika Stone, owners of this gastropub in Oak Park, California, are weeks away from going out of business. programme.desc: Bloodshed In The Bordello - The crew are in Globe, AZ, to investigate a former bordello that was a hive of sinful behaviour in the early 1900s. Did a dark energy lead to its murders?

programme.title: Booze Traveler S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Scotland Monsters Men And The Mac - Jack Maxwell travels to Scotland, where he encounters St. Andrews' 19th hole, part-time Vikings and the world's most expensive scotch.

programme.title: Off The Grid S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Episode 4 - [OFF THE GRID] is a program that follows top Korean celebrities taking a break for a 3 day trip all by him/herself and being completely themselves.

programme.title: Beyond The Unknown S4 Ep11
programme.desc: Bloody Benders, LA Raid and Tully Monster - Don Wildman investigates a frontier family's grisly killing spree, recalls an otherworldly sighting that terrified Los Angeles.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S17 Ep11
programme.desc: The Graber Farm Entity - Zak and the crew head to Ontario, CA, to investigate a century-old farm ripe with paranormal activity, particularly by a vicious entity known as The Creeper.
